TextLines: Hope you come to enjoy this server.
Please take some time to read the rules bellow.
<color=red> Rules: </color>
• No spamming in chat.
• No teaming in groups larger than 4 people.
• No teaming with other groups (trading allowed through safe zones and shop fronts)
• No racist or homophobic voice chat.
• Players with a VAC or Game ban within the past 3 months cannot join.
• No group raiding still classed as teaming if you only target one specific group with another.
• No calling cheats in chat, do this in discord using the ticket tool otherwise it will only make them disable there hacks and play more carefully.
Here you can see a plugin list for our server.
<color=red> Plugins: </color>
Sign Artist, Loot Plus, Stack Size Controller, Better Loot, Furnace Splitter,
Quick Smelt, Fancy Drop, Magic Loot, Event Randomizer, Server Info, Welcomer,
Clans, Stack Size Controller, Hit Icon, Time Of Day, Gather Manager, Heli Control,
Loading Messages, No Recoil Detection, Stash Traps, Stash Warning, Steam Checks
Follow our groups on discord and steam to access 150 free scrap.
Goto: <color=Red> www.CreepyOutpost.com </color> to find links to both
or join directly with the following links:
<color=Red> Discord: </color> https://discord.gg/d2hWyBmPby
<color=Red> Steam: </color> http://steamcommunity.com/groups/CreepyOutpost/
Sign artist allows you to add any url image to a sign in game, just stand infront of the sign and enter the following command.
/sil <url>
Bring this info box up any time with.
/info
Skin Box allows you to update the skin of any time in the game to any skin you want using the following command.
/Skin
Clans can be created when teaming with /clan create <name> then /clan invite <userID>
Invites can be accepted with /clan accept
The furnaces have auto-sort and doubled smelting times.
There is a rare airstrike item that can be found in elite crates to be used in combat/raids.
All electrical component blueprints are unlocked by default.
